title: How to Make Varnish Using PVA Glue

steps.headline: Set up the area.
steps.description: Cover the work surface with newspaper or other cover to protect it.

steps.headline: Use the ration of two thirds glue to one third water.
steps.description: The exact amount used will depend on the size of your craft project.

steps.headline: Pour two thirds of an amount of PVA glue into a mixing container.
Pour in a third of water.
Mix the two ingredients together thoroughly.
Apply to the craft object.
steps.description: The varnish goes on white and dries clear. It will protect artwork, decoupage, drawings and decorative elements attached to a craft project. Use a large artist's paintbrush to apply the PVA glue varnish.

It will protect artwork, decoupage, drawings and decorative elements attached to a craft project. Use a large artist's paintbrush to apply the PVA glue varnish. Finished.
